## Import libraries
```{r, messages = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(mapdata)
library(maps)
```


## Import data
```{r, messages = FALSE}
gdp <- read_csv("C:\\Users\\pscha\\Documents\\_School\\2022_Fall_Classes\\STAA_566_DataViz\\maps-pschaeferdc\\2017_gdp.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
covid <- read_csv("C:\\Users\\pscha\\Documents\\_School\\2022_Fall_Classes\\STAA_566_DataViz\\maps-pschaeferdc\\covid_per_capita.csv",show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
map2 <- map_data('world')%>%
  mutate(region = str_to_title(region))
p_map2 <- ggplot(data = map2,
                        mapping = aes(x = long, y = lat,
                                      group = group))
p_map2 <- p_map2 + geom_polygon(color="black", fill=NA)
p_map2 <- p_map2 + theme_minimal()
p_map2
```


2017 per capita gdp from 'worldometer', https://www.worldometers.info/gdp/gdp-per-capita/
4 Oct 2022 deaths per 100k from Johns Hopkins Coronavirus Resource Center, https://coronavirus.jhu.edu/data/mortality
